name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.
In a pan, cook pancetta and garlic until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and add to the pancetta pan. Remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley, and serve.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A flavorful Indian dish with marinated chicken in a creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan and cook chicken until browned.
Add onions and cook until soft.
Stir in tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes.
Add cream and simmer until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

name: Beef Burger
description: A juicy beef burger with fresh toppings and a soft bun.
instructions: Shape ground beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan and cook patties for 4-5 minutes on each side.
Add cheese slices to the patties and let them melt.
Toast burger buns and assemble with lettuce, tomato, onion, and patties.
Serve with fries or a side salad.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A healthy and colorful stir-fry with fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and ginger, and sauté for 1 minute.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and toss to coat.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve hot.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent dessert with a gooey chocolate center.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk eggs and sugar until fluffy, then mix in the chocolate mixture.
Fold in flour and vanilla extract.
Pour batter into greased ramekins and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Dust with powdered sugar and serve warm.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A classic salad with crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Toss lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan in a large bowl.
Add Caesar dressing and mix well.
Top with grilled chicken slices if desired.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.
